casebody.data:
ELM ST. GALLERY, INC., William B. Heroy, Anna R. Heroy, Individually and d/b/a Heroy Studios and Old Photo Specialists, Inc.
v.
Robert M. WILLIAMS and Shelia V. Williams. No. 414P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. W. Rob Heroy, Charlotte, for Elm Street Gallery, et al. Norman B. Smith, Greensboro, for Williams. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 663 S.E.2d 874 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th day of September 2008 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th day of December 2008."

EDMUNDS, J., recused.
